explains: n. 登山者；攀缘植物；尽力改善自己社会地位的人

sentences.en: The climber slipped and dropped to his death.
sentences.cn: 攀登者一失足掉下去摔死了。

sentences.en: The climber inched up a vertical wall of rock.
sentences.cn: 那名登山者一点点爬上了一处垂直的岩石峭壁。

sentences.en: She was an experienced climber, who had climbed several of the world's tallest mountains.
sentences.cn: 她是一个经验丰富的登山者，已经攀登过好几座世界最高的山峰。
